# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/q`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Q (https://github.com/kriskowal/q).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/q/v0.

### Additional Details
 * Last updated: Wed, 07 Jul 2021 17:02:41 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: `Q`
